contextSnapshot: A scaling Shopify store processing 500-2000 orders/month with a small team spending 15-40 hours/week on manual tasks, primarily struggling with customer support and inventory sync.
revenueLeaks: 70% cart abandonment rate losing ₹50k-80k/month in recoverable revenue
No post-purchase upsell automation missing ₹20k-35k/month from repeat orders
Manual inventory sync causing stockouts and overselling (estimated ₹15k/month in lost sales)
manualFriction: 15-40 hours/week spent on manual data entry and order updates
Customer support queries overwhelming small team capacity
Disconnected systems between Shopify and marketplaces requiring duplicate work

recommendedAutomations.what: Recover 15-25% of abandoned carts with timed WhatsApp/SMS sequences triggered at 1hr, 6hr, 24hr intervals
recommendedAutomations.tooling: Klaviyo + Shopify Flow + Twilio WhatsApp Business API

recommendedAutomations.what: Automated thank-you sequences with personalized product recommendations based on purchase history
Bi-directional sync between Shopify and marketplace listings (Amazon, Flipkart) with stockout alerts
GPT-4 powered chatbot handling common queries, escalating complex issues to team with context
recommendedAutomations.tooling: Custom GPT + WhatsApp Business API + Zendesk integration

recommendedAutomations.what: Real-time dashboard consolidating sales, inventory, ad spend across all channels
recommendedAutomations.tooling: Google Data Studio + Make.com + custom connectors

phase1: Post-purchase revenue automation (quick win, low effort)
phase3: AI customer support triage (advanced, high setup but transformative)

nextStepsCTA: Based on your 'done-with-you' preference, reply 'Let's build Phase 1' to start with quick wins, or 'Call to walk through this' for a detailed walkthrough. I'll respond within 24 hours.
